statements: SELECT * FROM Classes;
SELECT class_name, instructor_name FROM Classes;
SELECT class_id, class_name, meeting_time FROM Classes ORDER BY meeting_time DESC;
SELECT * FROM Classes WHERE instructor_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT class_id, class_name FROM Classes WHERE meeting_time > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY meeting_time;
SELECT * FROM Classes ORDER BY class_name DESC, meeting_time ASC;
SELECT class_id, class_name, instructor_name FROM Classes WHERE meeting_time > '2021-01-01' AND instructor_name LIKE '%Smith%';
SELECT class_id, class_name FROM Classes WHERE instructor_name = 'John Doe' ORDER BY meeting_time DESC;
SELECT * FROM Classes WHERE meeting_time BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY class_name ASC;
SELECT DISTINCT instructor_name FROM Classes ORDER BY instructor_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM Classes;
SELECT class_name, meeting_day FROM Classes WHERE meeting_day = 'Monday';
SELECT student_name FROM Students WHERE class_id = 1;
SELECT class_name, meeting_time FROM Classes WHERE class_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM Students WHERE student_id = 5;
SELECT * FROM Classes;
SELECT class_name, meeting_day FROM Classes WHERE meeting_day = 'Monday';
SELECT student_name, class_name FROM Students JOIN Classes ON Students.class_id = Classes.class_id;
SELECT class_name, COUNT(student_id) AS number_of_students FROM Students JOIN Classes ON Students.class_id = Classes.class_id GROUP BY class_name;
SELECT class_name, meeting_day, meeting_time FROM Classes WHERE meeting_day = 'Tuesday' ORDER BY meeting_time DESC;
SELECT * FROM Classes
SELECT class_name, start_time, end_time FROM Classes
SELECT student_name, email FROM Students
SELECT instructor_name, email FROM Instructors
SELECT class_id, class_name, start_time, end_time FROM Classes ORDER BY start_time ASC
SELECT * FROM Classes WHERE class_id = 1;
SELECT class_name, start_time, end_time FROM Classes WHERE start_time > '2021-01-01 00:00:00';
SELECT * FROM Instructors WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT student_name FROM Students WHERE student_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT class_name, instructor_name FROM Classes c JOIN Instructors i ON c.class_id = i.instructor_id;
SELECT * FROM Classes;
SELECT class_name, meeting_day FROM Classes WHERE meeting_day = 'Monday';
SELECT student_name, student_email FROM Students ORDER BY student_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM Instructors WHERE instructor_email LIKE '%@example.com%';

SELECT class_name, student_name FROM Classes INNER JOIN ClassEnrollments ON Classes.class_id = ClassEnrollments.class_id INNER JOIN Students ON ClassEnrollments.student_id = Students.student_id ORDER BY class_name ASC, student_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM Classes
SELECT class_name, class_description FROM Classes ORDER BY class_id DESC
SELECT * FROM Students WHERE student_id = 1
SELECT class_name, instructor_name FROM Classes JOIN Instructors ON Classes.class_id = Instructors.instructor_id

SELECT student_name, class_name FROM Students JOIN ClassEnrollments ON Students.student_id = ClassEnrollments.student_id JOIN Classes ON ClassEnrollments.class_id = Classes.class_id ORDER BY student_name ASC

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM Assignments;

SELECT * FROM Classes WHERE class_id = 1;
SELECT class_name, instructor_name, meeting_time FROM Classes WHERE room_number = 'A101';
SELECT student_name, email FROM Students WHERE class_id = 2 ORDER BY student_name ASC;
SELECT assignment_name, due_date FROM Assignments WHERE class_id = 1 AND due_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT student_name, assignment_name, grade FROM Students INNER JOIN Grades ON Students.student_id = Grades.student_id WHERE grade >= 90 ORDER BY grade DESC;
